channel.title: simulation on frieda rong
channel.description: Recent content in simulation on frieda rong

item.title: BEHAVIOR feedback: a benchmark for social perception
item.description: A project pitch for how smart agents can interact with us to better understand our goals in household activities by learning individual and cultural diversity.

item.title: GeoSim: Realistic Video Simulation via Geometry-Aware Composition for Self-Driving
item.description: Best Paper Candidate at CVPR 2021 How do we combine the best of graphics-based simulation and neural rendering?

item.title: Uber ATG Research Scientist
item.description: At Uber ATG Toronto (now Waabi) in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. endpreamble Demonstrated a data-driven pipeline for the photorealistic video simulation of cars inserted into urban driving scenes.

item.title: Uber ATG R&D Intern
item.description: At Uber ATG Toronto (now Waabi) in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. endpreamble Implemented a hardcoded baseline for the photorealistic image simulation of cars inserted into urban driving scenes.
